name: Paper, Scissors, Rock
description: A classic hand game played between two players
howToPlay: Players count to three in unison and throw one of three hand signals that correspond to rock, paper, or scissors. Paper covers rock, rock crushes scissors, and scissors cuts paper.

name: Hide and Seek
description: A game where players hide and one seeks
howToPlay: One player closes their eyes and counts to a predetermined number while the others hide. The seeker then tries to find the hidden players. The last player found becomes the next seeker.

name: Simon Says
howToPlay: One player takes the role of 'Simon' and gives commands to the other players, who must only follow the commands that begin with 'Simon says'. If a player follows a command that doesn't start with 'Simon says', they are out of the game.
